title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$y$$, we can subtract $$9x$$ from both sides of the equation, which gives us $$y=13-9x$$.
speech: To isolate  y , we can subtract  9 x  from both sides of the equation, which gives us  y is equal to, 13 minus 9 x .
pacedSpeech: from both sides of the equation, which gives us   y is equal to, 13 minus 9 x
